get.summary: Retrieve a single blog post by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the blog post to retrieve

body.description: Body content of the blog post

blog_image.description: URL of the blog post image

get.summary: Retrieve a paginated and filtered list of blogs

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of blog posts to return per page

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter blog posts by title or body

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter blog posts by category ID

200.description: Successfully retrieved paginated list of blogs

body.description: Body content of the blog post
body.example: This is the body of the blog post.

blog_image.description: URL of the blog post image

created_at.description: Timestamp when the blog post was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the blog post was last updated

from.description: Starting index of the current page

to.description: Ending index of the current page

active.description: Indicates if the link is for the current page
